Stephen Mariano Cabrera

Software Developer

Email Twitter LinkedIn Github Stackoverflow
Hi! I'm Stephen. I'm a freelance software developer, I work primarily for startups building web applications with ruby on rails. I love contributing to the community by building open source tools and sharing what I've learned with other developers through writing and speaking. I also love learning new things--lately I've been exploring elixir and phoenix. Here you can find blog posts, links to my online presence (on the left) and links to my projects and their source code.

You can download a current copy of my CV/Résumé here
